title: Untold: The Girlfriend Who Didn't Exist
description:
This one's a doozy! "The Girlfriend Who Doesn't Exist" is all about a national-headline-making catfishing incident that you have to hear to believe... and even then, it's still somewhat unbelievable. Plus, tales of Las Vegas, compulsive liars, and much more!

BUY TICKETS TO OUR LIVE SHOW, SEPT 22: https://app.loopedlive.com/b/8536

*this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)
